website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and efficient. Rely again and again on this 11-piece cookware set to create quick and flavorful meals.
pros: This set serves as a great gift for home cooks and seasoned chefs alike
Customers like that the nonstick surface is easy to clean in addition to the cookware's ability to heat food quickly
cons: While most customers love their set, some wish it came with one more large skillet

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set; they are well made, clean up easy, and function well. I have arthritis and didn't want really heavy pots but, at the same time, wanted a nice set. These pots fit my needs perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Customer Support and Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: They came with 6 quart Damaged. Customer support need a payment for a replacement. Very bad
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy - definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality, Especially for the price. They heat up fast and evenly. The non stick is amazing. Super easy clean. They have a nice weight to them. Not heavy but feel sturdy. They look great too. I use them daily and I am so happy with these. I would definitely recommend purchasing them. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: B. M

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: These lightweight pans are great for the average person making average dishes. The nonstick is pretty true, but be careful when you wash so as not to scratch the coating. I recommend hand washing as the dishwasher caused some significant discoloring on the bottom (back side) of the pan. But decent, especially for someone that is just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher MN

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these pots and pans thus far. Consumer reports have them thumbs up. Super lightweight too, which is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. H.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous set and work beautifully. Wash very easily. Long time fan of Cuisinart and these live up to brand reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Referencegirl

customer_reviews.title: Great pots especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like it is only because I have only cooked once with the pots. I actually LOVE these pots. I cooked at high heat in the skillet and pot stayed flat on my flat top stove, didn't bend at all. Heat was distributed evenly, food cooked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This set is a little too weak, not really what I expected, the quality is cheap is very light and you have to be careful how you use it, and clean it. It can't be left on the fire for too long , it's not recommended to place it in the dishwasher and not to use some types of detergents. The metal is very thin and the covers collects food between the glass and the metal rim which is hard to remove, I have to use a toothbrush to clean it. Being a Cuisinart product I expected more from it. And there's also the PTFE Teflon dangers.
customer_reviews.author: J. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have a nice set of Revere Ware, but I find myself more often using the Teflon set because it's easier to clean. Much of the coating has been worn off (I know...that's bad), so I bought this Cuisinart set to take their place. The weight is perfect -- not too heavy, not too light. The lids are quite nice, and unlike my Revere Ware, I won't need a hot pad to touch the lid handle. I feel that the price for the quality is excellent. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Skeezix

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality
customer_reviews.text: So this set is beautiful. I got the red and it’s very pretty. Also, I love this brand and have had good luck with it. Here’s the thing ....this is excellent quality for a mid level cooking set. Don’t buy this thinking you’re getting a $300 set for $100. You’re getting a $100 quality set. However, it’s what I needed and I’ll keep it. But know what you’re getting. This set may last a year or so but it’s not a set you’ll have for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Defective pot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Cuisinart Pot and Pan set back in November 2019. The rubber is breaking away from the handles already. These have never been cleaned in a dish washer nor put in the oven. Always hand cleaned and dried. Very disappointed in this product. I’ve tried calling customer service about the damage to my product but all I get is placed on hold and the call dropped. These are very inexpensive and lightweight but not very durable. Would not suggest purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kook

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good quality set, especially considering the price. They arrived in perfect condition and on time. They are medium weight and feel durable. I've only used them a few times so far, but I am certainly satisfied with them so far. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Look
customer_reviews.text: After searching a lot for cookwares, I finally bought this ones. I had a budget constraint with durability keeping in mind. The brands such as clad, calypole, etc are great but I wanted something little cheaper than those. Its a great cookware. All pieces are proper in size and have a decent look. Also I have just started using them, till not it goes great. Loved them. It is cheap in cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Quality + Price = A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive, well-made Pots and Pans set that is an incredible value! I love the long well-designed silicone handles on the pans and the glass lids. No pot-holders needed! The pans are lightweight but not flimsy and the heating seems to be even. I have not had a chance to use it enough to rate durability, (thus 4 stars)... but I am ecstatic at the quality, of this set, for the incredible price offered on Amazon. : )
customer_reviews.author: GearGirl

customer_reviews.title: these are working great for me
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are working great for me. I have made rice, stir fry, and other similar foods in them. They are super easy to clean, they cook food evenly, and heat up quickly. The red color goes well with a lot of other items in the kitchen. I like the variety in sizes of pots and pans, ensuring there is a pot/pan for every meal I could want to make.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pots and pans for a new married couple!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little start up pots and pans. Plus it is so cute. My mom bought these for me and my husband. It is the perfect number of pots and pans for us and the non stick is so helpful. The red is nice and vibrant. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The pots and pans are a nice weight and I like the red color. The handles are comfortable and do not get hot. I like the fact that they all have lids. The fit and finish are good and while I"ve only used them for about a month, they seem like they're going to last for years.. Overall these are good quality and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Underdog

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: SO far they are great and enjoy cooking with them. Needed a good price and something quick just to replace my other pots that were old. So far really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Tomes

customer_reviews.title: Lid Would Not Fit Warped Frying Pan
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice, but the matching lid would not seat properly on the frying pan because the pan was warped. There was no damage to either the interior or exterior boxes, so it must have been an error in the production of the pan. Obviously, quality control is lacking at Cuisinart. Returned set for refund.
customer_reviews.author: James Hollender

customer_reviews.title: The pans worked fine as advertixed
customer_reviews.text: Been using the pans since Christmas and they work as expected as far as the non-stick is concerned, and appear to be holding up as well. The light weight is wonderful, yet they are constructed in such a way that they won't fall over when empty and they sit on a burner flat and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken glass upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: A lid was completely shattered upon delivery. The glass bits that went to the bottom scratched up the surface. I tried following the contact link in the issues section to be directed to page that no longer exists. Not a great experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for about two months. Strong but not heavy. Spreads the heat evenly. Easy to clean. Love the size of the sauce pans. Pieces do not include nylon utensils which is one of the reasons I bought it. I want all pieces to be pans, pots and lids. The only piece missing is the 8” fry pan.
customer_reviews.author: MG from PR

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a starter kit for my daughter and she loves them. There were less expensive options but the reviews were not good. I really wanted something she could take beyond her first apartment. She loves the quality and look of these.
customer_reviews.author: RocWithYou

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these; cheap coating
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably scratched from nested storage, not metal utensil use. These are really junk quality. I’ve only had them two months and they need to go in the trash. Disappointed I’m unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Cook

customer_reviews.title: Scratch
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed. These things scratch easy. Less than a month old and I noticed scratches on them already. No metal utensils used or anything like that. Kinda let down by this brand. They used to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M King

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: We love our new set of pots and pans. Great color and nice quality for our usage. Super easy to clean, I like to hand wash instead of putting in the dishwasher since it only takes a minute to clean. Handles and glass lids are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of pans. Well packed. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of pans. Well packed. Super fast shipping. Got them today, will update this after I use them. UPDATE: Have used the frying pan, wonderful to cook with, clean up fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tfill

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t believe the price for this set up! I’ve been needing a new set for a couple years and just didn’t get around to it. The time must have been right because this is exactly what I needed! Great quality for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cookware set that was more affordable yet durable. This set is perfect for daily use and haven’t had any issues so far. I purchased the set 4 months ago and use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Now I enjoy cooking at home.
customer_reviews.text: My first set of pots, and they don't disappoint, I can even fry without the food sticking to the pan. and they are cleaned effortlessly. With them I can prepare food for everyone at home, it is ideal for a small family like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart 55-11R Advantage Nonstick 11-Piece Cookware Set, Red
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for a few months now, and I really like them a lot. They seem to be very high quality, and very easy to cook in and clean. I have other Cuisinart products, and I have always been very satisfied with their quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Rifleman

customer_reviews.title: I use these like a madman
customer_reviews.text: Okay I use these pans multiple times a day and they are amazing, I only cook on high heat and the bottoms have barely discolored on the fry pan, they are a dream to clean and for the money you can't get better, I only use silicone utensils on them so they don't scratch
customer_reviews.author: Robert Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware Set
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a skillet by Cuisinart a year earlier and loved it! I really needed a new cookware set and was hoping to find one that was similar to the skillet in ease of use and cleaning. This definitely fits the bill. It's so easy to wash up these pots and skillets that I don't even think of putting them in the dishwasher. So far, I have been able to cook my favorite recipes with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great set for me
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I'm getting rid of old scratched pots and pans. The perfect sizes for me and not too heavy. I haven't washed or cooked with them yet so if they don't work well I will amend review but they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: How it cooks abs easy
customer_reviews.text: I like these pots and pans. Great price looks great and cooks food quickly Easy clean up ! Dishwasher safe and I like the red color. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are a great quality set of pans and if you haven't bought pans recently these will surprise you with the speed in which it heats up on an electric stove.
customer_reviews.author: HHH

customer_reviews.title: small issues made easy to overlook for the value.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. The rivets aren't treated with Teflon so they tend to accumulate my morning eggs and are harder to clean.. that said you get a lot for the money and from a good name in kitchen wares
customer_reviews.author: Josh G.

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: So far I am happy with my purchase. Can't comment on the durability of the nonstick but it has pots and pans of different sizes catering to different cuisines. What I don't like is the fact that it takes a whileeee to heat up....
customer_reviews.author: Xaveri

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of pots and pans for my son’s first apartment. This set literally has everything you need, and then some! So easy to clean. This is the best price by at least $30 compared to retail stores for the exact same set. I highly recommend you purchase from this seller. Price cannot be beat, even with coupons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of pots and pans but dents very easy
customer_reviews.text: They perform very well to cook in, they are light in weight and found to dent very easy. Otherwise a good value for the dollars spent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Seaman

customer_reviews.title: New Pots and Pans
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and look pretty and works as needed but one pan does not fit flat, that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Starter set!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, and a little disappointing quality. My other set for a few more dollars runs circle around this set. A good beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: A steal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the different sizes, usually do not get this many sauce pans. Seem good quality so far and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for a new place! If your on a budget and need the best set for the money this one is it. Quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Wylie the Toy Aussie

customer_reviews.title: Great Line.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my set.i have the Red and maybe think I should have got the Black.cooks great,not heavy and does not urn your food.Love mine.Red.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Forte

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with another lid haha
customer_reviews.text: When I wash them, it looks muggy or it must be soap residue. I can try switching my soap but I don’t care all that much.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. Non-stick. Perfect set. Better than the previous ikea set we had.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this set, my only complaint is that the lids don’t fit tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Hannie

customer_reviews.title: Great set !
customer_reviews.text: Great set of pots at a great price! Love this set because it comes with all sizes that are useful. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and had a need for each size! Easy to clean. Love the color!
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: good pots, just 1 small frying pan though
customer_reviews.text: Seem well build with good non-stick. Time will tell how long they last. Would have been better to have a bigger extra frying pan rather than 6 pots and 1 small fryer
customer_reviews.author: the penguin & owl

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good set, we also purchased additional frying pans that were larger.
customer_reviews.author: Tkelly

customer_reviews.title: So far good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a few weeks so not sure of long term durability but for the price it's a nice set of pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got these for new RV. I have similar at home and I loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set of cookware.
customer_reviews.text: For my sons apartment. He puts in dishwasher and they are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: tshjeans

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price I absolutely loved it. I love how there are different sizes for different amount of food, they are easy to clean. But, I noticed how food sticks to it sometimes even when it is non-sticky so only 4stars. But, for the price I would consider it. Overall, good product for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Terrible quality and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: I would post zero stars if possible. Do not buy this product. I have tried to contact their customer service but haven't received any reply. While cooking for my toddler, when I lifted the pan from the stove the handle came out in my hand and the whole pan with boiling water splashed on the gound and stove (fortunately my toddler was not close and I had the instinct to jump back so no one got burned). But it could have been a terrible accident. I don't thrust these pans anymore and contacted the customer service to see how I could get them returned (the have less than 2 month use).
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Easy to clean, my problem already have some scratches but overall they are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick surface on these is really non-stick. Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Best pans I have ever bought. You dont need oil or anything to cook with them and everything cooks up nice with no sticking.
customer_reviews.author: DV

customer_reviews.title: Bubbled a little
customer_reviews.text: It kind of bubbled up a little on the bottom and doesn’t lay flat anymore. But I will manage.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. The pots and pans are easy to clean and cook evenly. They also look nice. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used in vacation home.
customer_reviews.text: Nice though not as costly or heavy as our emeril set
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! I’ve been using these for the past few months and have no complaints at all. They’ve held up without and issues.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good product, however some of the handles have become wiggly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy a better set. The first first time I used a piece, skillet to cook some pancakes, they stuck very badly and the residue was extremely difficult to remove. Returned the set immediately
customer_reviews.author: John R Horton

customer_reviews.title: I would've selected a better quality and a heavier set
customer_reviews.text: They are very light weight and lack the quality of what I was expecting. Had I seen and touched them prior to purchase, I would've selected a better quality and a heavier set, and paid a little more.
customer_reviews.author: John Modiri

customer_reviews.title: Ok pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Thin light pots and pans but holding up so far
customer_reviews.author: Shoe

customer_reviews.title: Can buy better then this
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the Product but it's okay to give a try who cooks very less.
customer_reviews.author: Rohith kumar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of pans
customer_reviews.text: This set of pans has been amazing. They heat very efficiently, using less heat to cook and applying it evenly across the pan. Clean up has been a breeze. This is an amazing set of pans.
customer_reviews.author: KPase

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line pots and pans so far.
customer_reviews.text: Best pots and pans I have ever bought, they cook evenly and clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Webber

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who was moving into her first apartment. Good starter set. Not overly heavy but will definitely do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: So great to cook!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a week and this set is amazing! I hope that it continues to be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Mihika Naik

customer_reviews.title: Quality and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set and I have to say I’m very happy with them. Great quality for the price. I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Yaniza

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with cuisinart! Good quality. I love the color it matches my kitchen I also love the grips on the handles and the lids.
customer_reviews.author: gina ramirez

customer_reviews.title: The heat distribution at low and high heat is good. I like the glass top so I can ...
customer_reviews.text: These pots work very well. The heat distribution at low and high heat is good. I like the glass top so I can observe it cooking without losing heat. The only thing I don't like is the bottom of the pot stained in the dishwasher so I hand wash now.
customer_reviews.author: fairequeen333

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: they are awesome set of pots and pan my only complaint is they scratch easily so use your plastic utensils on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set, Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: nice practical set for light everyday use. good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Pauls UMC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The wife really likes the pots and pans and they're a good value
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Got used ones and unsatisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I didn't order the used ones. But the products I received are used. I checked every single one and they were used.
customer_reviews.author: South Bay innovation

customer_reviews.title: Got a really good price during the holidays and am really happy with ...
customer_reviews.text: This set exceeded my expectations. Got a really good price during the holidays and am really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Received these as a wedding gift and we love them! My parents have been using their Cuisinart ...
customer_reviews.text: Received these as a wedding gift and we love them! My parents have been using their Cuisinart pans for years and years!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Great products from now on I will by this brand
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Pot cover doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week long and the non-stickiness is real. However for the largest one the pot cover doesn’t fit the pot. Is it super difficult to make a pot a perfect round shape???
customer_reviews.author: Sihong

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from a favorite ba
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The pans do tend to build up starch marks if cooking potatoes or pasta.
customer_reviews.author: barbara henry

customer_reviews.title: These are amazeing I have another set to I got ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazeing I have another set to I got this set because I need more pits n pans only ones I will buy:)
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent pot set. Wellpacked for shiping. Lids fit beautifully, and foods cook evenly. Great nonslip handles. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S

customer_reviews.title: nice pans for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really, really, nice pans for the price! Nothing sticks and they can go in the dishwasher !
customer_reviews.author: Marlene G.

customer_reviews.title: Never sticks and easily cleaned
customer_reviews.text: It has been 3 months since I got those! Amazing results so far! Non sticky and cleaned easily
customer_reviews.author: Heba

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly. Like the color and only dislike is no small frying pan.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I did not like was there was no small frying pan. Other than that have been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret LaValley

customer_reviews.title: ... a little over a month now and I absolutely love them! Cooking seems so effortless now
customer_reviews.text: I have had this set for a little over a month now and I absolutely love them! Cooking seems so effortless now. This is truly nonstick. I can scramble eggs without oil and nothing sticks and the food comes out beautiful. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, and very handy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of kitchen wares with enough lids. Don't use a fresh green scrubby-it'll mar the surface. Once the scrubby has been broken in, it can then be used. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SawShave

customer_reviews.title: Very good every day pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Very good every day pots and pans, can't beat the price. They not top of the line but really work for basic cooking.
customer_reviews.author: RdUFF

customer_reviews.title: Not a Heavy Cookware Set
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This cookware is extremely light weight. Not the quality I would have expected from Cuisinart. I hope it will be durable. I'm doubtful.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are sturdy,well balanced,they each have a lid,and clean up is a breeze. Priced right too!
customer_reviews.author: Maycat

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love! Everything down to the handles on the cookware! Very pleased, since I don’t really trust online shopping- can’t actually touch merchandise prior to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sugardoll

customer_reviews.title: Good price,elegant look and ease to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I use this produts to cooking every day. Ease to clean,very elegant also i use Little oil.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fatima nines pereira

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a few month, no problem so far. It's easy to clean, and lasted very well so far. Very good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sina Akbari

customer_reviews.title: Great set light weight an very easy to cook with
customer_reviews.text: Great set light weight an very easy to cook with. Since my wifes been sick these are easy for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pans. They cook nicely. The only issue I have is the handles on the big pot get REALLY hot. You can't take it off the stove without using pot holders. Why can't it be made out of the same stuff the other handles are made of, I am not sure!
customer_reviews.author: jess123456

customer_reviews.title: Best non stick surface I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best non stick surface I’ve ever used. Not sure what happens when you put it in the dishwasher I’ve followed the directions just cleaning it in the sink and it rinses right off everytime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Advantage Nonstick 11-Piece Cookware Set, Black
product_meta.description: Size:11 Piece| Color:BlackPrepare virtually anything with the Cuisinart Advantage Non-Stick 11-piece Cookware collection. An elegant black metallic exterior that complements any kitchen decor lets cooks simmer, saute, fry, boil and braise in style. The pure aluminum core provides quick and even heat while the premium nonstick surface provides lasting food release and easy cleanup. Fantastic results with dishwasher safe convenience.
